column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Zhang leader says : " Care for some meat ? "
#Text=Sokka says : " Would I ! "
#Text=Zhang leader says : " I know what you must be thinking , we 're horrible for endangering everybody by bringing food down here . "
#Text=Sokka says : " Hm - hmm . "
#Text=Zhang leader says : " The Gan Jin think so badly of us , they probably assumed we brought food in and decided to bring food in themselves .
#Text=" Zhang leader says : " Our conflict with the Gan Jin goes back over a hundred years .
#Text=Our forefather Wei Jin was leaving the western gate of our village , when he saw a figure in the distance .
#Text=It was a man of the Gan Jin tribe , Jin Wei , collapsed on the ground .
#Text=Noble Wei Jin stopped to help him .
#Text=Jin Wei was transporting a sacred orb , a very powerful relic used in his tribe 's redemption ritual .
#Text=Wei Jin tried to tend to the man 's wounds but Jin Wei insisted the orb was more important , and asked him to take it back to his tribe .
#Text=Kind Wei Jin promised to send help for the man as soon as he could , but as Wei Jin crossed the border to return the orb into Gan Jin territory , he was arrested .
#Text=Instead of thanking him for his kind and selfless deed , they sentenced him to twenty long years in prison .
#Text=We Zhangs will never forget that injustice .
#Text=" Sokka says : " That 's just terrible .
#Text=You gon na finish that ?
#Text=" Aang says : " Sure would be nice to be sitting around one of those campfires , telling stories and laughing .
#Text=Its okay Momo , we 'll be out of here soon enough , and then we can eat our weight in leechi nuts !
#Text=Nah , I 'll wait for the leechi nuts .
#Text=" Canyon guide says : " Lonely is n't it , being impartial ?
#Text=" Aang says : " I wish I could help these people get along , but it just seems impossible .
#Text=Anyhow , I guess our biggest problem is getting out of here .
#Text=" Canyon guide says : " I 'm not so sure the two problems are unrelated .
#Text="
